Text.Page:
Have you heard of {@LinkCreature:21#5003#Bloodjaw}? It's the most vicious basilisk in this crag. None of us can match it.

Think you're an exception?

Hah! I knew you could do it, . In fact, I bet heavily on you!

With that bloody basilisk dead, the rest of us might be able to make some headway out here. Well done. This is well-earned!
I put down a big pile of coins on your success. I don't want to talk out of school, but the odds are long and the money is good! If you survive, you'll make a tidy profit!
